channel.title: Crash on bm_c1a1e
channel.description:
So, My game Continuously crash (hl2.exe has stopped working) after going through this door: ([url]https://imgur.com/a/Vfd3g#prQ5M[/url]).
I've tried reinstalling the game, and replaying it all over again, but no such luck,
anyone having a similar problem, or know any solution for this?
